titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 50th anniversary of the 1962 Seattle World's Fair.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 4/19/2012--Introduced. Celebrates the 50th anniversary of the 1962 Seattle World's Fair in Washington state. Commends the city of Seattle for its innovation, growth, and entrepreneurial spirit during the past 50 years. Supports the "Next Fifty" initiative to develop a blueprint for success in Seattle for the next half-century.
